title: QueryReduce
name: QueryReduce
description:
Iterates over every row of the given query and calls the closure with that row.
		This function will reduce the query to a single value and will return this value.

arguments.name: closure
arguments.description: function/closure that implements the following constructor [function(any result, struct row[, number rowNumber, query query]):any].

arguments.name: initalValue
arguments.description: inital value passed as part of the first closure call
